item.title: Highbond Reports - Users might experience issues while trying to access Reports in all Non-US Regions.
item.content:encoded:
Feb 8, 10:28 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Feb 8, 10:17 UTC
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.

Feb 8, 08:44 UTC
Update - We apologize for the inconvenience. Our team is actively working on resolving the issue with the highest priority.

In the meantime, if you need to access Reports, you can use the following workaround. Should you require assistance, please don't hesitate to contact our Customer Support, and they will be happy to help.

Workaround:
1.) In Launchpad, hover your mouse cursor over the Reports tile.
2.) Right click and select "Copy Link Address"
3.) Open a new tab in your browser and paste the link that you have just copied in the address bar.
4.) Add a "-" and your region code after https://reports in the URL.

The region code is the two letters of the URL. For example, if your URL is https://reports.highbond.com/?loginOrg=123&orgRegion=eu, your region code would be "eu", and you would change the first part of the URL to https://reports-eu.highbond.com/.....

Feb 8, 06:06 UTC
Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

Feb 8, 05:45 UTC
Investigating - Users might experience issues while trying to access Reports in all Non-US Regions. We are working on the solution with priority. Apologies for the inconvenience caused.
